Comment: By Dan Cody - Digital Media Reporter:   Vice President JD Vance has reflected on the legacy of Pope Francis and their recent meeting, acknowledging policy disagreements but emphasizing the pontiff's lasting impact as a pastoral leader.  Speaking to reporters in Agra, India, on Wednesday, Vance addressed questions about whether he would attend the pope's upcoming funeral and shared personal insights into their encounter, which occurred less than a day before the pope's death.
